mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Originally designed as the drive-up annex for the bank, Wes Peters repeated the dramatic round form used in that building in this small annex, which is now home to the Spring Green Chamber of Commerce." -- http://www.wrightinwisconsin.org/Events/2012SpringGreen.aspx [work]
